introduction: PHOTOGRAPHER Tim Walker is gearing up to make his first film, a short piece entitled The Lost Explorer. The film is a coming of age story which centres on a young girl called Evelyn, who discovers an explorer camping at the bottom of her garden, adapted from the story by Patrick McGrath.The Lost Explorer will star Toby Stephens (of Jane Eyre), Jessica Hynes (of Son of Rambo), Richard Bremmer (of Control), Dexter Fletcher (of Stardust) and will introduce new star Olympia Campbell. The film is the latest project for producing partners Ben Pugh and Rory Aitken, who recently worked together on Shifty.
